INSERT INTO tb_kepco_15m( metering_date, hhmm, ami_idx, use_type, reg_dt, mid, kepco_cstmr_no, metering_val, accmlt_metering_val, api_call_result, error_response_msg, mod_dt ) SELECT * FROM (
( SELECT #{item.meteringDate} AS meteringDate, #{item.meteringTime} AS meteringTime, #{item.amiIdx} AS amiIdx, '1', sysdate(), #{item.meterNo}, #{item.custNo}, #{item.meteringVal} AS meteringVal,
#{item.accmltMeteringVal} AS accmltMeteringVal,
IFNULL(( SELECT ( SELECT accmlt_metering_val FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1=1 AND ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date = ( SELECT MAX(metering_date) FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1=1 AND ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date <= #{item.meteringDate} ) AND hhmm = ( SELECT MAX(hhmm) FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1=1 AND ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date = ( SELECT MAX(metering_date) FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1=1 AND ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date <= #{item.meteringDate} ) AND hhmm < #{item.meteringTime} ) )) , #{item.meteringVal}) AS accmltMeteringVal,
#{item.apiCallResult} AS apiCallResult, #{item.errorResponseMsg} AS errorResponseMsg, ( SELECT IF(metering_val IS NULL , sysdate(), mod_dt) FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1 = 1 AND use_type = '1' AND ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND metering_date = #{item.meteringDate} AND hhmm = #{item.meteringTime}) AS modDt )
) AS A
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = meteringVal, accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal, api_call_result = apiCallResult, mod_dt = modDt

INSERT INTO tb_kepco_hour( metering_date, hh, ami_idx, use_type, reg_dt, mid, kepco_cstmr_no, metering_val, accmlt_metering_val ) SELECT * FROM (
( SELECT #{item.meteringDate},
'24',
LPAD(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{item.meteringDate}, #{item.meteringTime},'00'),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), INTERVAL -15 MINUTE),'%H') + 1, 2, '0'),
#{item.amiIdx}, '1', sysdate(), #{item.meterNo}, #{item.custNo}, SUM(metering_val) AS meteringVal,
#{item.accmltMeteringVal} AS accmltMeteringVal
MAX(accmlt_metering_val) AS accmltMeteringVal
FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1 = 1 AND use_type = '1' AND mid = #{item.meterNo} AND metering_date = #{item.meteringDate} AND hhmm <= #{item.meteringTime}
AND hhmm > '2300'
AND hhmm > CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{item.meteringDate}, #{item.meteringTime},'00'),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), INTERVAL -15 MINUTE),'%H'),'00')
)
) AS A
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = meteringVal, accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal

INSERT INTO tb_kepco_day( metering_date, ami_idx, use_type, reg_dt, mid, kepco_cstmr_no, metering_val, accmlt_metering_val ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT #{meteringDate}, #{amiIdx}, '1', sysdate(), #{meterNo}, #{custNo}, SUM(metering_val) AS meteringVal, MAX(accmlt_metering_val) AS accmltMeteringVal
FROM tb_kepco_hour WHERE 1 = 1 AND use_type = '1' AND mid = #{meterNo} AND metering_date = #{meteringDate} ) AS A
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = meteringVal, accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal

INSERT INTO tb_kepco_15m( metering_date, hhmm, ami_idx, use_type, reg_dt, mid, kepco_cstmr_no, metering_val, accmlt_metering_val, api_call_result, error_response_msg ) SELECT * FROM (
( SELECT #{item.meteringDate}, #{item.meteringTime}, #{item.amiIdx}, '1', sysdate(), #{item.meterNo}, #{item.custNo}, #{item.meteringVal} AS meteringVal, ( SELECT MAX(accmlt_metering_val) FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date = (SELECT MAX(metering_date) WHERE ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND metering_date < #{item.meteringDate})) AS accmltMeteringVal, #{item.apiCallResult} AS apiCallResult, #{item.errorResponseMsg} AS errorResponseMsg )
) AS A
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = meteringVal, accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal, api_call_result = apiCallResult, error_response_msg = errorResponseMsg
mapper.update: INSERT INTO tb_kepco_15m(metering_date, hhmm, mid, use_type, accmlt_metering_val) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT #{meteringDate}, b.hhmm, #{meterNo}, '1', nextAccmltMeteringVal - ( SELECT SUM(metering_val) FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date = #{meteringDate} AND hhmm > b.hhmm AND hhmm <= b.nextHHmm ) accmltMeteringVal FROM ( SELECT a.* , ( SELECT hhmm FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date = #{meteringDate} AND hhmm > a.hhmm AND accmlt_metering_val != 0 LIMIT 1 ) nextHHmm , ( SELECT accmlt_metering_val FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date = #{meteringDate} AND hhmm > a.hhmm AND accmlt_metering_val != 0 LIMIT 1 ) nextAccmltMeteringVal FROM ( SELECT hhmm, metering_val FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND use_type = '1' AND metering_date = #{meteringDate} AND accmlt_metering_val = 0 ) a ) b ) result ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_kepco_hour( metering_date, hh, ami_idx, use_type, mid, kepco_cstmr_no, metering_val, accmlt_metering_val ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT #{meteringDate} , a.hh , #{amiIdx} , '1' , #{meterNo} , #{custNo} , a.meteringVal meteringVal , ( SELECT SUM(metering_val) accmltMeteringVal FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1 = 1 AND use_type = '1' AND ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND mid = #{meterNo} AND CONCAT(metering_date, hhmm) <= a.date ) accmltMeteringVal FROM ( SELECT hh , MAX(date) date , SUM(metering_val) meteringVal FROM ( SELECT metering_val, IF(hhmm = '2400','24',LPAD(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(metering_date, hhmm, '00'),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), INTERVAL -15 MINUTE),'%H') + 1, 2, '0')) hh, CONCAT(metering_date, hhmm) date FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE 1 = 1 AND use_type = '1' AND ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND mid = #{meterNo} AND metering_date = #{meteringDate} ) b GROUP BY hh ) a ) result ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = meteringVal , accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal

INSERT INTO tb_kepco_day( metering_date , mid , use_type , reg_dt , ami_idx , kepco_cstmr_no , metering_val , accmlt_metering_val ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT #{meteringDate}, #{meterNo}, '1', sysdate(), #{amiIdx}, #{custNo}, ( SELECT SUM(metering_val) FROM tb_kepco_hour WHERE use_type = '1' AND ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND mid = #{meterNo} AND metering_date = #{meteringDate} ) meteringVal, ( SELECT SUM(metering_val) FROM tb_kepco_hour WHERE use_type = '1' AND ami_idx = #{amiIdx} AND mid = #{meterNo} AND metering_date <= #{meteringDate} ) accmltMeteringVal ) result ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = meteringVal , accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal
